testcase.name: The Details, What It Includes, Special Services which open respectively on the page related to a product that is randomly clicked, should not be empty.
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to main url................................................passed When I check 25 titles on the mainpage......................................passed Then I take screenshot and save as "mainpage_loaded_successfully"...........passed Given I go to products tab and click randomly a product.....................passed When I see the product is loaded successfully...............................passed Then I take screenshot and save as "productpage_loaded_successfully"........passed When I check are we at the right page.......................................passed Then I should see all informations tabs has their explonations..............passed Then I take screenshot and save as "customer_can_take_informations_about_product".passed
